data.title: Spaghetti a la Mode (Short 1915)
data.meta_description: Spaghetti a la Mode: Directed by Will Louis. With Will Louis, Oliver Hardy, Vincente DePascale, Royal Byron. Antonio and Pascale spend the last of their money on a lottery ticket. Then they go to a restaurant for a big meal of spaghetti. When the restaurant owner realizes they can't pay, a fight breaks out and Antonio and Pascale run for their lives.
